message: Module error while trying to update local heating control config: failed to download sheet '<googleapiclient.discovery.Resource object at 0xf48a3b70>' from spreadsheet 'Kazánfűtés heating control config': The read operation timed out (TimeoutError).

Module error while trying to scrape and log external temperature: error during external temperature scraping: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='api.open-meteo.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /v1/forecast?latitude=47.4984&longitude=19.0405&current_weather=true (Caused by NewConnectionError('<urllib3.connection.HTTPSConnection object at 0xf51e4ad0>: Failed to establish a new connection: [Errno 101] Network is unreachable')) (ConnectionError).
